mdRecord.dcterms:title: Binoculars
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Colmont [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black binoculars with leather case. Inside of case reads: "Marque de Fabrique, Colmont Fab! Paris, 37 & 39 Avenue de la Republique, Paris." Back of case reads, "P.E. Duggins, Medical Corps USA." Property of Percy Elisha Duggins (1890-1965), a 1913 graduate of the UVA School of Medicine
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Binoculars
